attributes.action: think about 1) ending Baby Bond payments, and 2) means testing child allowance benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do people without children, or with grown children, have to pay to help support other people's children?  The Baby Bond and child allowance is currently given to wealthy people who are saving it for university educating their children.  If they want children, they should pay for them.  By dropping the ridiculous Baby Bond, and means-testing child allowance, millions of pounds would be saved to go to the NHS or other worthy causes.
